bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for the Surge Parameters of Isolating Transformers Used in Networking Devices and Equipment
IEEE Draft Standard for the Surge Parameters of Isolating Transformers Used in Networking Devices and Equipment

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Terms, test methods, test circuits, measurement procedures and preferred result values for the surge mitigation parameters of isolating transformers used in networking devices and equipment is set in this standard. Three types of isolating transformer are considered; mains low frequency power, high frequency power (switching mode power supplies) and signal (e.g. Ethernet data).
